mention.text: a cancer researcher at the University of Texas-M.D. Anderson Cancer Center , Houston Dr. Estey recently began treating patients with 2-CdA and has had similar results with five patients '' It 's a striking finding , '' Elihu H. Estey says '' It 's very unlikely to be a fluke
Houston Dr. Estey recently began treating patients with 2-CdA and has had similar results with five patients '' It 's a striking finding , '' Elihu H. Estey says
the most effective treatment for hairy-cell leukemia , in terms of rapidity of response
the most effective treatment for hairy-cell leukemia
patients -- most of whom had failed other treatments --
